name: Gitpod
description: Gitpod is a cloud-based IDE that integrates with GitHub, allowing developers to create, edit, and test their code in a pre-configured workspace.

name: Codepen
description: An amazing online community for testing and showcasing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code snippets.

name: Tryit
description: Another online platform for testing codes written in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

name: OnlineGDB
description: OnlineGDB is an online integrated development environment (IDE) that provides a convenient platform for coding and testing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: StackEdit
description: StackEdit is a user-friendly online Markdown editor with real-time collaboration and cloud storage integration, making writing and editing documents effortless and accessible from anywhere.

name: Sololearn
description: It's a multi-language online code editor where you can test and share your code snippets.

name: CodeChef
description: An online IDE to practice your competitive programming skills. It allows you to code in multiple languages.

name: Visual Studio Code for the Web
description: An online code editor built with Visual Studio Code

name: Replit
description: An online IDE with inbuilt collaborative, hosting  and AI features.

name: Codesandbox
description: A cloud development platform that empowers anyone to code, collaborate, and ship projects of any size from any device in record time.

name: OneCompiler
description: Got a new feature for your web app? Implement it with OneCompiler on mobile and anywhere. It supports over 60+ programming languages and frontend frameworks.

name: StackBlitz
description: StackBlitz is an online code editor powered by WebContainers that allows users to create, collaborate, and deploy web applications.

name: Programiz
description: Learn to program with our beginner-friendly tutorials and examples. Read tutorials, try examples, write code, and learn to program.

name: codewars
description: Codewars is an online platform that offers coding challenges suitable for individuals with diverse programming proficiency levels.

name: Interviewbit
description: Everything you need to crack your next tech interview is provided on this website

name: Sublime Text
description: Sublime Text is a shareware text and source code editor available for Windows, macOS, and Linux. It supports many programming and markup languages.

name: GeeksforGeeks
description: It is a free online compiler and debugger where programmers and developers can compile and run their code.

name: Coding Blocks
description: In addition to the IDE with code completion, you can also create an account to save your code on the server and share it with others.

name: Rextester IDE
description: With Rextester, you can create a execution command for the program along with code compilation.

name: CS Academy
description: In addition to code compilation and execution, this source consists of workspaces

name: Ideone
description: Ideone is an online compiler and debugging tool that allows developers to compile source code and execute it online in more than 60 programming languages.

name: Jdoodle
description: It is a free online compiler and code editor to save, run and share code anytime

name: CodinGame
description: This is a great website to learn and practice your coding skills. It provides interactive challenges in different programming languages

name: JSitor
description: An advanced editor to write, test, and share JavaScript, CSS, and HTML snippets. Supports TypeScript and libraries too.
